title: Real Time Chat
text: What's the fun if you can't chat with your loved one while watching your favorite videos? We support GIFs as well as float messages to be visible while you are watching at full screen.

section.title: Add GIFs
section.content: We understand that GIF makes chat more fun and hell yes we need it in a party

section.title: Customize Username
section.content: Styled Components gives you total control over your components.
